room_title: Escape room "Hostage Hotel" by Lake Escape in Lake Ozark
review: The Hostage room was the 6th escape room my wife and I have done. The aesthetics are great and all the puzzles were a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Hotel" by Lake Escape in Lake Ozark
review: Made our escape in Hostage Hotel. This was our first escape room experience and will recommend to everyone who visits. The staff was super friendly and a lot of fun. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Hotel" by Lake Escape in Lake Ozark
review: Went with a range of ages and we all loved it! Hostage Hotel was so fun. Don't tell anyone but we couldn't escape. I definitely recommend checking them out!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Hotel" by Lake Escape in Lake Ozark
review: The staff was awesome! We did the Hostage Hotel and almost got out. It was a lot of fun and we will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Hotel" by Lake Escape in Lake Ozark
review: We had a great time! Hostage Hotel was a really neat setup and the staff was wonderful! Would definitely do it again!
